## DebugMessenger() function

Decorate a [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) so that it will log any message exchanged

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function DebugMessenger(messenger: Messenger, log?: (...data: any[]) => void): Messenger;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  messenger | [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) | The Messenger that will be decorated |
|  log | (...data: any\[\]) =&gt; void | The logger function that will receive each message |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md)

A decorated Messenger
